briefTitle: A Phase III Study of the Efficacy and Safety of Remimazolam Compared to Placebo and Midazolam in Colonoscopy Patients
officialTitle: A Prospective, Double-blind, Randomized, Placebo and Active Controlled, Multi-center, Parallel Group Study Comparing Remimazolam to Placebo, With an Additional Open-label Arm For Midazolam, in Patients Undergoing a Colonoscopy
summary: A prospective, double-blind, randomized, placebo and active controlled, multi-center, parallel group study comparing remimazolam to placebo, with an additional open-label arm for midazolam, in patients undergoing a colonoscopy for diagnostic or therapeutic reasons.

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From administration of the first dose of the study drug to the end of colonoscopy
